website_summaries.verdict: A basic beverage dispenser  that you won't have to worry about breaking.
pros: Made of lightweight acrylic that will not break
cons: Spigot can leak if tightened too much

customer_reviews.title: The spigot inside material might disintegrated through time- Buyer be aware!
customer_reviews.text: We have the dispenser for a few years, and it worked as it stated. When we noticed that there were silver material pieces in our cup, we removed the spigot, and found out that the inside of the dispensing spigot (which is a silver, chrome like materials) were breaking off. We use the dispenser for storing drinking water, can't imagine other beverages with acidity will have it's impact on . We are not sure how long it has been disintegrated, and how long we have been taken down this materials with our water. From looking at the inside of the spigot, most of the silver coating have been gone. Buyer should check on your!
customer_reviews.author: CDL

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I travel and demo cocktails and other alcoholic beverages. This guy is a beast. I haven’t hardcore dropped it yet, but bouncing around in my car, as well as it’s been knocked over a few times (mostly empty) and it still looks brand new. Hardware for the spigot is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty disappointed, I thought something was strange when the instructions didn't match the dispenser - but assumed it was just generic and seemed simple enough to assemble (no locks to hold the dispenser in place on the stand - per the instructions, faucet piece different, etc.). But then I noticed there are a ton of noticeable scratches all over it, I tried to wipe it down with no success. This was delivered maybe 2 minutes ago before opening and assembling. For the price, I thought it would be a little better quality - would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great item for entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing beautiful and very functional item. We have used it already few times when we host a large group or a small group of people to serve Iced tea or Lamonaide. It worked very well and the drinks looked beautiful. It is fantastic for any cold drinks! You can serve cold water with some slices of lemon or cucumber and it is very attractive. The item is very easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Berkovitz

customer_reviews.title: Delivered without spigot assembly
customer_reviews.text: Just received this beverage dispenser and there was no spigot assembly in the box making this item useless. On the directions for assembly there was a website given for [...] to contact for missing parts. From previous posts I see that this has happened to others who have purchased this item. Beware that if you are buying this beverage dispenser to use at a scheduled party or affair you may be waiting for missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family event. It worked perfectly. My brother in law ended up borrowing it for his party. Now it’s at my sisters house for the next party. This is durable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect. It held water and kept cool. No cracks. Perfect for bridal shower
customer_reviews.author: Pink Springz

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Need to use carefully. Unstable. Did not come with the infusers. Positive- does keep water cool. Over the years, I have found more reliable containers.
customer_reviews.author: Sophi

customer_reviews.title: I love this dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this beverage container for use at our family Christmas eve dinner. I had just received it in the mail earlier in the day so I did not have time to freeze ice in the base- I just filled it with crushed ice from my refrigerator. I then filled the dispenser with lemonade and added two pitchers of crushed ice directly into the dispenser. Our party lasted about seven hours. When I cleaned up afterword the lemonade in the dispenser was still cold. There was absolutely no problem with leakage. Because a couple of others mentioned problems with etching and discoloration, I washed it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Girl

customer_reviews.title: Liquor-ey Glory
customer_reviews.text: If someone ever talks about how alcohol they can drink, you can use their own ego to kill them. Fill it up halfway with liquor, add a splash of lemonade, and tell them to gulp away. You can add ice to the bottom, and it's durability is matched by it's easiness to assemble. I've owned it for years and have not had it leak or crack, despite a few times when it was struck by people who couldn't see the three gallon mixer surrounded by people. Sadly, these people were not Ray Charles, so they had no good excuse.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice beverage dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dispenser. I bought two and both work well. No problems with leakage around the spout and the directions provide instructions for how to deal with issues if it does happen. I did follow another reviewer's advice and use a skinny vase filled with ice put in the middle because the ice on the bottom ends up melting and doesn't provide enough chill. The only other issue is one I have with all of these type of dispensers and that is the location of the spout - it should be lower. As it is, you have to have a couple of quarts in before it will start dispensing. Overall I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Timbermountain Trader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great large size. Didn’t need to refill. 3-gallons of drink. Wish the ice container under was a little larger and wider but I put cold drink in to begin and it stayed cold.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Cheap Handle Spout!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item ahead of time for my daughter's bridal shower and wedding. I used it twice (for the bridal shower & wedding) and the handle spout broke. Cheap, Cheap!! Beware!! I saw a glass beverage container in our local store, should have bought that one. At least, I would have been given a refund, if something was defective. No refund available, because I ordered it too early. Shame on me! I guess-sometimes planning ahead works against you!
customer_reviews.author: Reformation Lady

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy this when I broke the glass pitcher at my work. Decided that if we were all going to be using something it had to be tough. Well we've had it for a few months now with no cracks, no wear and tear at all in fact. Super easy to clean and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Girl

customer_reviews.title: Priced Just Right
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a large baby shower. Bought 2. Filled one with ice water and sliced cucumber. The other with ice water and sliced fruit. What a hit at the party! Checked a lot of other websites and could not find any others that hold this abount of water for this price. Arrived in a box suitable for storage. Easy to assemble. I have now used it for a dinner party. Very attractive. It appears as if you can put ice in the bottom resevoir, however, I just put ice in the water. Saw one at WalMart for a few dollars more...might save shipping.
customer_reviews.author: flamingogirl

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice for parties
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice for parties, etc. Gonna take a lot of ice to keep things cold...I thought it might have a center piece that would keep the liquid cold and not water it down...but there isn't. We just get ice from a store or put water in an ice cream bucket and freeze it. So far we have just used water in it so the watering down isn't a big deal, but we'll have to come up with something else when it is tea, punch, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The carafe is used in our church Fellowship Hall to ...
customer_reviews.text: The carafe is used in our church Fellowship Hall to dispense tea, water and lemonade. So far they have been without leaks and held the liquid. They work as expected and we look forward to long service from them
customer_reviews.author: DaGama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! 3 gallon is more than enough for big party. Lastly big items like this is not widely available at your local retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Deo Optimo Maximo

customer_reviews.title: Okay for price-material degrades with citrus after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: They get so dirty and it seems the material just erodes away, when you add citrus. Which is a bit strange as the marketing image has citrus.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kleefisch

customer_reviews.title: Great for home entertaining on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: This needs hand washing and fairly gentle care, but it is immensely practical and looks great with fruit infusions. It is perfect for home/party entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: JT Boston

customer_reviews.title: This is a one or two times use product, no more
customer_reviews.text: The lid simply doesn't fit or stay. It's not broken, its just designed horribly. I have their other products that match this one almost identically, but the material here is completely different. The plastic is elastic rather than firm so the top pops up and off in seconds even if you manage to get it on and the faucet is from even a cheaper kind of hard plastic. I hope it lasts through its first party/use. Not sure how I'm going to keep the lid on. I give it 2 stars because for a one time use purposes, it's worth the cheap price... maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Chips very easily
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the "unbreakable" claim here. When I took this out of the box and went to wash it, I tapped the edge of this against the faucet as I was putting it into the sink (it's huge! try not touching anything as you try to wash this 3 gallon giant!) and one square inch of it splintered the plastic. I never filled it up that high so I don't know if it would have caused a leak, but it marred the appearance of this thing within 5 minutes of arrival. On the plus side, the spigot system does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We use this at all of our parties. The compartment underneath is great for filling with ice to keep your beverage cold, and it's also great because it lifts the dispenser off the table so that you don't have to put it right at the edge of a table in order to hold a glass under it. Drinks stay cold for hours. It's also super lightweight since it's plastic, and it's easy to fill. I haven't had any issues with the spout leaking either. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good buy!
customer_reviews.text: The punch container will have scratches in the inside from stirring it with he spoon. Not to big if a deal though.
customer_reviews.author: The Burdett's

customer_reviews.title: Film on inside of dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these dispensers for use in our church hall. Have used them about 4 times. One is still crystal clear on the inside, the other has a large blurry ring around the inside at the top. We used these for iced tea, water and punch and cleaned them very carefully. Nothing takes this film off and it looks dirty now and embarrassing to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this same type dispenser over the years and knew this is what we wanted for our pool party/BBQ for over 200 here in Palm Springs, a few weeks back. We made 2 mixed "punch" types in them. The "Lyndsy Lohann" and "Charlie Sheen" we had signage with names and ingredients for each. Needless to say, everyone had comments, all good! There ya have it. Just be creative and since these are clear we were able to keep them full with our pitchers of backups.. You can't go wrong here and a side note, it's best to skewer you garnish's and fruit so they don't clog the spigot! Have fun..
customer_reviews.author: tbonedawg

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Product looks exactly as pictured, came a bit scuffed up out of the box. Also it's made with very cheap plastic. I dont expect to get many uses out of it. Works for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: sarah Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, good size. You hand tighten the spigot on, "unbreakable " but don't over tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ley

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: My party wouldn't have been the same without it. Who would want to make the mixed drinks constantly. Now I could enjoy the party and not worry! :-D Some people might say its cheap. It's light. It's works great though and when you have all the liquid in there it'll be heavy. Also if you make a strong good drink, no one is going to be like "ewww what a crappy dispenser" and if they do, add more liquor...
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The main dispenser is made of plastic, which is fairly obvious when you look at it. The spot is also fairly cheap. I bought two of these and the first one broke after one use when I was washing it and banged it up agains the side of the sink. Since then I've been more careful with the other one and haven't had any issues. It's great for serving lemonade and seems to hold the beverage cold enough assuming you add enough ice. It also holds quite a bit. I only had to refill it once, but that was with a larger sized party.
customer_reviews.author: J Thao

customer_reviews.title: Beverage Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This was just perfect for my party. I used it for Sangria. Its size for perfect for the wine, fruit, and ice. The dispenser is both attractive and easy to use. Washing it was a breeze as it all comes apart for easy cleaning. The product arrived promptly, which I appreciated as I had ordered it for use at a party. I really loved being able to do a search, find it at Amazon and have it delivered in a few days. That saved me from driving around, store to store looking for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Smithfield

customer_reviews.title: it's nice, but it will scratch
customer_reviews.text: This will scratch and mar easily. I suggest coating it with something fun like gluing on some pretty glass dots on it with E6000 to keep it looking nice and keep the scratches from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Allisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice drink dispenser for an outdoor summer party!
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to put together (you must install the spout) and it looks great. I have not used it yet but anticipate no problems. I will add a supplemental review if the spout leaks upon use, but for now, I washed it by hand and then filled it with some of the rinse water and there was no leaking at that point. This looks great and I expect it will perform as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen C. Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these dispensers. I purchased 3 of them for a party i was having and i've used them several times. I have even lent them out to friends for parties. I had sangria (a wine and fruit drink) in one of them. Sometimes the spout would get clogged but it only happened 2 or 3 times and the fruit was easily dislodged by mixing up the drink. Very easy to put together also. I wish they would make the lids more secure though for easy transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: A little top heavy and tilts over easily. Needs a more sturdy base
customer_reviews.text: A little top heavy and tilts over easily. Needs a more sturdy base. It didn't leak though- I was concerned it might.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Material inside the spigot began to flake off almost immediately. General quality is just okay.
customer_reviews.author: DXer99

customer_reviews.title: Dispenser Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this beverage dispenser!! I didn't open it prior to our event this weekend and I should have because when I opened it, it was missing pieces. It was missing the spout and the bottom part that contains the ice to keep the beverage cold. I had to go out and buy something to hold our punch in last minute.
customer_reviews.author: noe lujan

customer_reviews.title: Damaged within first use
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly thrilled. It holds water but within first use it was damaged. Added a few orange slices to the reservoir and noticed when I was cleaning it that the plastic was damaged, as if the fruit ate away at the plastic. Perfect for water use only but going to toss and order something in glass.
customer_reviews.author: Keibbler

customer_reviews.title: larger than it seems and requires easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and would highly recommend them. You have to assemble the spout (easy to do) and actually-- works out for storage because you can take it off, clean it and put it inside the main compartment so the spout doesn't get in the way where ever your storing it. ALSO-- the base can be stored inside the main compartment inverted... PERFECT for storage too.
customer_reviews.author: pandajoi

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Usable, but Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, this product isn't the highest quality, and isn't built for professional, every-day use. That said, you can't beat the price for what you get. My biggest complaint is the flow rate -- they look like they would pour quickly, but not so. About the same speed as the water dispensor on the fridge, maybe slightly less. Aside from that, I used two of them for my Christmas Eve Bash, and had no problems at all. I would suggest being somewhat careful putting it together correctly, using the minimal force.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sturtz

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Large Parties or Events
customer_reviews.text: Great dispenser for large parties. It came with a stand which was super helpful and didn’t have any issues with leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia S.

customer_reviews.title: cute style, missing quality
customer_reviews.text: We used this one time for a party at our house, we had a simple fruit punch in it. The level went from half full to empty in about 4 hrs. But somehow during that time the punch left an etch mark all around the container about half way down. I only hand washed it with a soft sponge and you can feel the etching is permanent. I was hoping for the convenience of plastic but it seems I'll have to choose glass which I know will hold up to juice.
customer_reviews.author: M Woch

customer_reviews.title: Not just for lemonade!
customer_reviews.text: We use this Dispenser on a daily basis. It's not just for flavored drinks, but for water as well. USEFUL HINT: Fill the Jar completely with ice (some sliced lemons) add a little bit of water- and you'll have COLD water all day long as the water melts. Clean look with great lines that can handle a posh buffet or just a water dispenser on the counter. Hope this review was helpful!!!
customer_reviews.author: JohnQpublic

customer_reviews.title: "Unbreakable" but delivered broken
customer_reviews.text: So apparently UPS can break the "unbreakable" because this piece was delivered broken. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: SCR

customer_reviews.title: "Must Have" Beverage Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, lightweight but sturdy. Spigots are water tight and at the perfect height to dispense into higher glasses. The base holds a regular size whipped topping container that can be filled with water and frozen to keep the beverages cold without the fear of diluting them too much with adding too much ice in the beverages themselves. Definitely a "must have" in my book! A great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Ria Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Did the job for party. Nice quality....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these used. Good value for party. Not sure I would pay full price
customer_reviews.author: Daisy M.

product_meta.title: Creativeware 3-Gallon Unbreakable Beverage Dispenser
product_meta.description: Style Name:UnbreakableAcrylic 3 Gallon Beverage Dispenser Will not break if it tips over, making it just as safe and easy to serve cool, refreshing beverage. Lighter fortransporting. Just lift off top with handle and add your favorite beverage, ice, fruit or sweeteners. Features no-drip, easy pull spout for dispensing. Tighten the spigot enough when assembling the item to prevent leakage issues. Great for parties or everyday use.
feature_bullets: Serve cold beverages with ease indoors or out with a lightweight acrylic container; easy to transport and will not break
Amply sized to hold 3 gallons; features a no-drip, easy-pull spout for dispensing
Features a compartmentalized base that can be filled with ice for additional cooling; also features a wide mouth and removable lid
Handle makes it easy to lift off for adding more ice, fruit, or sweeteners; makes a great gift for newlyweds or new homeowners
